thread.title: Speedskating Disqualification Riles South Korean Fans

author: Timothy W. Martin
title: Speedskating Disqualification Riles South Korean Fans
text:
PYEONGCHANG, South Korea—South Korean fans once again proved their passion for speedskating, though not in the most attractive fashion.
The host country’s fans hurled online criticisms, including death threats, at a Canadian speedskater who won a bronze medal after a controversial disqualification of a South Korean athlete.
